website_summaries.verdict: The rugged Olympus Tough TG-310 doesn’t offer the zoom range of more expensive models, but its image quality is on par with competing cameras, and it comes at an attractive $200 price.
pros: Modest price for a rugged camera
Waterproof to 10 feet, shockproof to 5 feet, freezeproof to 14°F

customer_reviews.title: Truly Tough
customer_reviews.text: This'll be my third model and fifth camera of the Stylus Tough series. Already had this same one for six months, took it too deep skin diving. NOT a dive camera, but truly tough and weatherproof. I've lost three cause they go where a camera should not go. A high end card helps a lot with recycle speed. I'm trying orange to help with losing it problem. If you've ever drowned a camera in the rain or ruined one with dirt, think about this one- it's impervious, I would hand it to a three year old in a mud puddle!
customer_reviews.author: Scott Edward Larosa

customer_reviews.title: Has lasted a long time
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera over a year ago and we use it 5 nights a week to take before and after photos at our job sites where it is greasy and wet. I download the photos every week and charge the battery for the next week. I have not bought a new battery yet. It gets abused in the rough job environment but it still works and the pictures look great. FYI - I also bought two TG-320 models and one still works and one doesn't but it lasted almost a year. I have no idea what the difference is between the two model numbers - they look the same.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: worked great underwater
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera to use while snorkeling in Hawaii. I didn't have any problems with it, except the fish were too fast for me! I got great shots of a sea turtle, however. The color of the photos appears to be very saturated and water shots both above and below the surface turn out very blue. I snorkeled for a couple of hours before the battery died, so it is better than a cheaper camera using AA batteries. It also shoots in video, zoom mode, and wide angle "stitch together" mode. I'm sure there are better models out there, but for the money this was a good deal instead of buying disposables.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Another great Olympus product
customer_reviews.text: I have become a die hard Olympus digital camera fan. I've used them underwater, either with housings in the old days, or now two types of these "tough Series" of cameras. This one was bought for the office to take pictures of events. Employees are not the most careful with company property, so having a camera which is dustproof, waterproof, can be dropped to the floor without harm, and can be stepped on without harm; gives me a lot of peace of mind. Can't do anything about it being "theftproof" but at these low prices I will just have to take that chance.
customer_reviews.author: Henry Wolford

customer_reviews.title: We had lots of fun!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this camera mainly to take snorkeling photos on our vacation to Dominican Republic. We used it for that and so much more! We had fun playing with the different settings, picture modes, and especially the panoramic setting. Unfortunately the camera was lost in a taxi. We have a few other cameras, including a dSLR but I have missed having this little camera around. So, today I bought it again, and I am sure we will get as much enjoyment from this one as we did before. When using it underwater, remember to soak it in fresh water after for about 10 minutes so it isn't harmed by the salt or chlorine.
customer_reviews.author: J. Otto

customer_reviews.title: Good camera, especially for the price
customer_reviews.text: So far I have only used this camera once but it was on a float trip. The camera worked well under water and took decent shots. The outside photos turned out great. I have not yet tried to use it inside. The video feature works well also. I love the multi-shot feature where you hold the button down and it takes continuous pictures. I got some great shots of my fiance jumping off cliffs - action shots of him all the way down. I would definitely reccommend this camera for someone looking for a decent, inexpensive, waterproof camera.
customer_reviews.author: cassiesmith00

customer_reviews.title: Good for "tough" situations but not the best all-around
customer_reviews.text: I received this camera as a gift after we went rafting in the Grand Canyon and a fellow rafter had the same camera. We backpack and kayak frequently and this is a great camera to take along, being resistant to most dirt and water. The downside of the camera is the quality of photos. Unless it is a clear blue day with optimal lighting, the pictures are grainy. Any movement and the photo is blurred. While I love it's durability (I do not want to take my SLR on a kayak!)it is not my "all around, go to" camera. We save this one for only extreme situations but for the price, it does quite nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not bad just don't expect to outlive it.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera twice and it broke both times. That beings said while it worked it was a great camera. The first time I went swimming and submerged it maybe 5ft down and it was never the same after. The second go round it lasted a bit longer but slowly stopped taking pictures. I think they have better ones now. I wanted something I wouldn't have to worry about for any type of situation such as sailing and climbing and whatnot. Wasn't horrible but not Olympic Tough.
customer_reviews.author: Barclay Davenport

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera for a family vacation/cruise where I wanted to be able to take photos on the beach and while snorkeling. It lasted 1 1/2 days. I opened the camera to charge the battery and found moisture inside and the battery starting to corrode. Fortunately, I was able to salvage my memory card. I am soooo disappointed. I had already read comments from other people who have had the same problem. I should have listened. If you have the money to spend, consider purchasing a camera with a better reputation.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Hood

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to buy a waterproof camera for an up coming mud run. Something I wouldn't care if it broke. So I was looking for a cheap waterproof camera. I looked at quite a few but the cheap ones were really cheap. Either very few functions or didn't shoot video. I stumbled upon this one and I am glad I did. The mud run is still a month away but tested on the ski slopes and it did great. I even took it to the pool and let my kids play with. This camera is better than I thought it would be considering the price. I feel comfortable recommending it.
customer_reviews.author: Turbodad

customer_reviews.title: The camera is exactly what you'll expect it to be
customer_reviews.text: Good quality photos & video, even under water. When its sunny out it can be really hard to see the screen, so that can make taking pictures difficult. I love the face recognition & there are settings to recognize cats & dogs faces as well so you can get a good shot of them if you can keep their attention! Easy to use, help function will take you through whatever you dont understand. Great quality for the money.
customer_reviews.author: TheMadScientist

customer_reviews.title: olympus
customer_reviews.text: I chose this camera,because of its lower price, and I didn't know a thing about digital cameras. This camera is very good for the lower price,and its not hard to figure out how to use,for a first time digital camera owner,thats not too interested in figuring out how to use something. The battery life Is excellent, and its lightweight. I would buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: bcoll

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good camera for price and features
customer_reviews.text: This camera takes pretty good pictures for its price and waterproof/shockproof ability. I would like to have a viewfinder and not just a screen but then I knew that ahead of time. The only thing I really don't like about it is that it, as far as I can figure out, it either shuts of quickly when idle or can be set to stay on for quite a long time draining the battery. it needs a middle ground.
customer_reviews.author: H

customer_reviews.title: Great accessory for the beach!
customer_reviews.text: This little camera really is waterproof for just the swimming pool or shallow water at the beach. We didn't try very deep, but it was so fun to take pictures under water and even for pictures above the water, we didn't have any worries about catching great shots of the kids playing in the ocean. A great camera to have for family trips!
customer_reviews.author: JoBuck

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this camera! I love the fact that I don't have to worry about getting it wet. I am a college swimmer and am constantly around water so this has been great. I also took it on spring break with me to PCB and I never had to worry about getting salt water on it. The only thing that bugs me some times is that it will take some blurry photos if you don't let it focus first. You have to press part way down on the button to let it focus and then push it all the way down.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Takes good pictures, but could be better quality
customer_reviews.text: This camera takes good pictures, especially for the price, but the images could be better quality. Using the camera underwater sometimes produces slightly foggy looking pictures, but I have noticed this with most waterproof cameras. Overall, I'd recommend this camera based on the price and the quality, given its low price compared to other cameras.
customer_reviews.author: sk

customer_reviews.title: Great outdoor camera.
customer_reviews.text: Great camera all around. If you are an outdoors person like me then this is what you want. Ive had it with me hiking in Az, canoeing, and tubing.......Its been under water and in the dirt and still going strong. Here is a photo of a water fight I was in while tubing.
customer_reviews.author: DANNY F.

customer_reviews.title: Love this camera!
customer_reviews.text: I am a very basic point-and-shoot user but I love that it's durable and waterproof, and I bought an Olympus floatie strap to put on when I use it in/around water. I am very happy with the camera that I bought around 9 months ago (and I am TOUGH on cameras). Takes great pictures. The menu is a little bit slow, but not a big deal.
customer_reviews.author: ckelbrin

customer_reviews.title: Great when it worked.
customer_reviews.text: bought this camera to take along a hawaiian holiday. the first few days with it, camera worked great. Took it snorkeling, swimming in the pool. Images and videos were nice and clear. the 4th day of heavy usage, it wouldn't turn on and when I opened the battery door, water came out. rest assured, I always checked to lock the door to prevent any accidental leakage but this thing was just dead. So beware. I guess next time, I will just with a go pro.
customer_reviews.author: Alfredo Saulo

customer_reviews.title: Worked as advertised
customer_reviews.text: This camera was underwater with me for hours while I floated and still works perfectly. This camera fell out of a basket of a moving bike and still works perfectly. Very pleased so far. Be careful when buying a spare battery. The manual is for 2 different models that use 2 different battery sizes. This one uses an LI42B.
customer_reviews.author: Sedgwint

customer_reviews.title: Great camera for the money, but very limited battery life.
customer_reviews.text: Survived 3 snorkeling trips and took lots of other great pictures on our vacation last week. Pretty easy to use. The "?" feature made it easy to find the right mode to take pictures in different situations, and the results were mostly really good. The only problem was the battery life sucks! Ordered an extra battery when I bought the camera, but Amazon recommended the wrong one, so it didn't work. Also, Olympus uses an odd shaped cord, so I couldn't use any other USB cord to charge. Missed a lot of photo opportunities because of that. I plan to get an extra cord and another battery before I use the camera again for an extended period.
customer_reviews.author: NA$HVILLE

customer_reviews.title: Olympus TG-310 Digital Camera
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera for my girlfriend for kayaking and she loves it. She hasn't touched her 12 MP Olympus Stylus since she got this. She loves all of the extra modes to take pictures in, like the watercolor, drawing or panorama modes. It's been dropped multiple times and seen it's fair share of water and still works like new. We've seen other reviews stating that the buttons are stiff and clumsy to push but we didn't have a problem with them. I would definitely recommend this camera, especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: anelson

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Camera!
customer_reviews.text: Just got back from Nassau and this camera worked great! It was used snorkeling, waterslides (at Atlantis Resort) and the pool and never encountered any problems. I think the secret with any waterproof camera is to thoroughly rinse and/or soak in fresh water after use in the ocean or pool. Overall I'm very pleased with this camera.
customer_reviews.author: Android Matt

customer_reviews.title: Good little camera!
customer_reviews.text: This is a good little waterproof camera! I bought this for an anniversary gift for my husband and we used it in Maui. It worked great in the pool, ocean, and as a regular camera. The colors are washed out though, had to use some simple editing software to bring the contrast and colors back. The battery life was ok... about 150 pictures and 15 minutes of video. For the cost of the camera, it did what I expected. Good little point and shoot, fun to have one that can get wet. I would recommend a float bracelet if you are taking it into the ocean or pool, it keeps the camera visible and above the 10 feet recommendation.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: its the best camera! Takes the clearest pictures and is very ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my grandson...its the best camera! Takes the clearest pictures and is very easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: Phylcote

customer_reviews.title: Nice waterproof camera
customer_reviews.text: I like having a well made, waterproof camera. We take it to the beach and lots of other places. Also, was great to sent to camp with our daughter (it is tough). The photos are good, but not great - but we have other cameras for when we don't need something "tough" or waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: I liked them so well
customer_reviews.text: actually bought 2 of these. I liked them so well.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Hoff

customer_reviews.title: Great underwater point and shoot
customer_reviews.text: Took it on holiday to Mexico over spring break. Great for snorkeling and playing around in the water. Does a fine job with HD movies, too. Works fine in and out of the water. The separate movie button was nice (instead of switching to movie mode and pressing the shutter release button like on other cameras, you just press a record button on the back of the camera). Only downside was the sort of short battery life. It didn't last a day of taking 50 or 100 pictures and a few short movies. I think I'll purchase a second battery, which will easily get me through a day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This camera is amazing for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I am really pleased with this camera. I have bought all different types of cameras and this one is a great camera for the price. My daughter is a photographer and she has an older model of this camera and loves it. She uses it just as a point and shoot since she doesn't want to lug her SLR camera everywhere. We liked the waterproof, shatterproof and freezeproof qualities. She normally only has a camera last for a year or so due to dropping it or getting it wet and this one has lasted over 2 years. So happy I took her advice and found this at such a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa P

customer_reviews.title: Not bad.
customer_reviews.text: Stand up to the reputation for ruggedness, and it is a satisfactory point and shoot pocket camera with one exception - the delay between button push and the picture being taken can sometimes be as great as a full second and a half. This is a bit annoying.
customer_reviews.author: J walt

customer_reviews.title: great pictures, color and quality
customer_reviews.text: My family is loving this camera. Are only gripe (small as it may be!) is that the zoom and playback buttons are small, and when the camera is wet, the buttons are a little hard to use. Other than that, great pictures, color and quality! Simple features make it ideal. Rechargeable battery is a plus! Worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: KE77

customer_reviews.title: Love this camera!
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this is a GREAT camera. I bought one about 6 years ago & it finally crapped out...not because of poor quality, which is why I purchased another. I use it scuba diving all the time & am very pleased with it!
customer_reviews.author: amazon2309234

customer_reviews.title: Solid Camera
customer_reviews.text: Can't complain, I have to say you aren't going to get the underwater quality you may expect. The light under water is just not good enough for awesome pictures. Granted this got the job done up to 50ft deep when we went scuba diving, much better than no camera at all! However, I expected better picture quality. I can't dock Olympus stars for something that isn't their fault, I shouldn't have expected what I did from this style of simple camera. The picture quality is typical of other similarly priced point and shoot cameras, much better when dry =). Overall a good buy, glad we had it with us on the Honeymoon to brave the elements and "adventure".
customer_reviews.author: Oweezy9

customer_reviews.title: This camera is great! I have not used it much but it ...
customer_reviews.text: This camera is great! I have not used it much but it has served me well for what I needed and still works. have had it in the water and all good!
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine S

customer_reviews.title: I use this for work
customer_reviews.text: I have it attached to a monopod that extends to about 20 ft and it gets banged around a lot. It still takes quality pictures and gets the job done. Haven't tested the water proof part yet.
customer_reviews.author: mitchell

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Not good, this product has screen that's not visible after like 5-10 seconds & you re-press button. Terrible deal.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Battery life doesnt last as long as i would like but it takes lovely shots underwater and normally.
customer_reviews.author: Maddy

customer_reviews.title: good for underwater pictures and videos...
customer_reviews.text: However, as for regular pictures, I found that the quality wasn't too great. I bought it strictly for underwater and waterproof adventures, but I will stick to my other camera for the rest of my photos.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina

customer_reviews.title: Good camera
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for husband. He wanted something that could withstand sitting in a backpack and rough trail rides. He wanted a phone he didn't have to baby. Takes good pics. Happy with purchase
customer_reviews.author: Jenn B

customer_reviews.title: It's been around the world
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to take with my on a cruise. It did perfectly through pools and ocean. Not only did it last for the cruise, but years later it remains water tight, and it's been on several houseboat trips, including being thrown off the side of the boat. BUT! It doesn't float, and I would highly recommend buying a float attachment for it. I bought a yellow Chums waterproof camera float and it works perfectly! It's important to read the directions and let it air out after each time you open the battery compartment. The poor ratings on here clearly didn't read the directions and take proper care of their camera.
customer_reviews.author: H.Urig

customer_reviews.title: Olympus Digital Camera
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a graduation gift for a grandson. His pictures and video were beautiful. He has taken it on hikes and other activities and he is very happy with the camera.
customer_reviews.author: ejk

customer_reviews.title: NOT  waterproof, EVEN if cared for, picture quality slightly off
customer_reviews.text: to start with weatherproof quality, which is the raison d'etre of the camera. I have now used it in the summer in many american lakes, where it worked, but also in sea water where it failed. I had always washed the camera immediately after in regular tap water. Now to the picture quality. One expects some impairment relative to normal cameras, and the picture does seem slightly soft. Moreover, the flash is far too bright, and one must snap from much farther away with a zoom to ensure any type of moderate exposure. Really this should not be the case.
customer_reviews.author: nopotato

customer_reviews.title: Great camera!!
customer_reviews.text: This camera is awesome! I've had it for 5 years now. Still waterproof. Still takes amazing photos. Macro? Yus please. Super macro? Be still my beating heart!! Videos are higher res than my phone which rocks. Easy to charge. Easy to unload videos and photos. The transfer cable is a pretty common hookup so if you loose it, it's easy to find a replacement. I've taken it in ponds, rivers, oceans, across continents, over hemispheres, and into a cup of coffee or two. It doesn't come with a case! I also highly recommend a larger memory card than the one that comes with. Bottom of the camera has a notch for screwing into tripods.
customer_reviews.author: M. Warner

customer_reviews.title: It's alright...older models are better
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting this camera to be like my old Olympus. Buttons on this one are rubber which at times make it difficult to press. It's also a bit slow. I guess you get your money's worth.
customer_reviews.author: KatD

customer_reviews.title: Great pics, bad battery
customer_reviews.text: Had to buy a new battery almost immediatley. Wouldn't hold a charge :(
customer_reviews.author: SO AZ

customer_reviews.title: Boa compra
customer_reviews.text: Máquina muito boa, fácil de usar, fotos ótimas embaixo d'água. Poderia vir com acessórios como capa, pulseira flutuante e cartão de memória. Estou satisfeito com a compra.
customer_reviews.author: Eduardo - Brasil

customer_reviews.title: Great camera for price
customer_reviews.text: We have had this camera for over a year. Good photos, can't say much about underwater, but nice to know it can get splashed.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen

customer_reviews.title: Working Well for ~2 Years
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my father to use when he goes kayaking. He's had it for about 2 years now, and it is still working well.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Twain

customer_reviews.title: Works well but....
customer_reviews.text: I've owned several Olympus cameras but I have to say this was not the best one. For the money it's worth it but don't expect to get the bells and whistles you will from better models. The controls are tedious to use when trying to take pictures with gloves on, unlike some other models, and it lacks lighting when in macro mode. I used the camera for less than a week and went back to an older model. This camera is now a backup in case my older one breaks. In the end I wish I would have spend more but you do get what you for in this camera.
customer_reviews.author: Vince Santos

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: everything worked well happy so far have not taken it under water yet lets hope that is good that's why we purchased thanks again!
customer_reviews.author: batman

customer_reviews.title: love it!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for our trip to cozumel. Loved being able to take it in the water with us and on our snorkeling trips. No problems with leaking. Only thing I figured out is the shutter speed is a little slower when under the water so I learned to keep my hands steady a little longer than normal. We got some great shots of beautiful fish along with beautiful beach shots of us. Won't go on another beach trip without it!!
customer_reviews.author: csonnier

customer_reviews.title: Xmas gift
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my best friend, she seems to like it (except its blue). we'll see how it holds up to water in Hawaii.
customer_reviews.author: C. Jett

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value
customer_reviews.text: All the features that I want for a water-resistant pocket camera. Comprehensive menu that even I can understand and implement. Good value for the price and quality.
customer_reviews.author: John Stowell

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This camera is a great product, we already had purchase an older version of the camera and i wanted a version for myself. I have been very pleased with it, and will continue to use this camera for many years. I like the waterproof feature, as it allows me to take underwater videos and to go kayaking with no worries about the camera. Good buy, I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: dek

customer_reviews.title: RED HOT TOUGH CAMERA
customer_reviews.text: Took camera on trip to Vail. Double Diamond runs; snow and ice. Cold weather and wind NO Problem. takes nice pics easily. Purchased 8gb memory card and shooting at highest setting. Once uploaded to computer Awesome Pics. Not an SLR or best of best but good camera to take with you anywhere!
customer_reviews.author: DREAM.Z

customer_reviews.title: works well under water
customer_reviews.text: I know some people have complained about water leakage but I think that was operator error. My kids love theirs.
customer_reviews.author: Larry W.

customer_reviews.title: not so waterproof
customer_reviews.text: this was my second waterproof camera. The first one failed. Then I read reviews about the importance of cleaning properly after use in saltwater, because the salt causes the seals to fail. I cleaned this one regularly, and it still failed after snorkeling. Was able to retrieve some of the pics on the memory card, but the camera is a loss. I am going to stick to regular non-waterproof camera. I think inexpensive waterproof camera is an oxymoron, unless you just get one of the throwaway cameras.
customer_reviews.author: Hehr

customer_reviews.title: took it for somones gift and had to return this back.
customer_reviews.text: got it as a gift item for a friend. the item came packed with a bit of damage to the box. amazon customer service did a great job by taking it back. this review is not for the item as i haven't used it at all but for the way its packaged. even the way it was packaged didn't give me a good impression of the product. th color differs a bit on what is seen in the picture. a five for amazon service and a 2 for the product.
customer_reviews.author: mikep777

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera got it on time
customer_reviews.text: Execellent value, camera was in perfect order. I would have liked to receive the instructions and all of the attachements that came with it.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Bought this when I went to Mexico, went snorkeling and para sailing with it and it took great pictures and videos above and below sea.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Jobsite camera
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a camera that will hold up to tough jobs then try this one out. This camera was purchased to take photos of in progress construction jobs and it has been used in all types of weather. After a year It is still working without issues and you get good quality photos.
customer_reviews.author: MtPeaks

customer_reviews.title: Great little camera
customer_reviews.text: Bought one of these 4 months ago for my grandaughter who is 16, and she hasn't been able to hurt it yet! This one is for my daughter-in-law, as she kills cameras all the time. And I plan on buying one for myself. Great little camera!
customer_reviews.author: Marlene Blanchard

customer_reviews.title: good camera but didn't last long
customer_reviews.text: i bought this camera for a trip to mexico. it took amazing pictures, even underwater. it was not until after i got back home that when i used it again, i noticed a fog on the lens. i never had it in water after my trip. all of my trip pictures turned out fantastic though. i would still buy another one of these cameras. maybe it was just a lemon.
customer_reviews.author: Claydeezy

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: the seals degrade and the water leaks in after a year.
customer_reviews.author: Rheann Z.

customer_reviews.title: ok
customer_reviews.text: Camera back home very practical easy to carry yet downloaded the pictures I took, and I was afraid to stay with her at Aquatica in the U.S., but I'll do a test on the beach in Brazil
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Eduardo Alvares Correa

customer_reviews.title: Excellent camera
customer_reviews.text: Christmas present for my daughter-in-law She wanted an underwater camera for their vacations for pictures of her children She loved it
customer_reviews.author: candyaple

customer_reviews.title: leaker
customer_reviews.text: Within a month camera leaking water through the battery compartment after very limited use at the surface of the water (no diving). Gasket is clean. Buy another make and model.
customer_reviews.author: shelley

customer_reviews.title: Best Under water camera ever!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I just used this camera for my JAMAICA trip and it worked amazingly!!! I was suprised. Pictures so crisp and clear and amazing color. Captures all under water action. Extremely excellent camera! I would recomment this camera to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Gigglesqt777

customer_reviews.title: Camera
customer_reviews.text: The recipient loves it. Works great. The camera takes great pictures and videos. Small size makes it very handy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Frances Boman

customer_reviews.title: Not Waterproof!!
customer_reviews.text: I took the camera to Maui recently and hoping I could take some underwater pictures with the kids. It worked all fine for the first 2 days (I rinsed and dried the camera as instructed after each use) and on my third day the camera suddenly stopped working. When I took it out from the pool and I could see water inside the viewfinder and the lens. It was quite disappointing as the camera would fail this quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Barry W.

customer_reviews.title: Great in and out of water!
customer_reviews.text: Was really impressed that it took good, recognizable photos under water. Out of the water, it's pretty darn good too. If what you want outside is too bright or dark, tilt the camera up or down and when it exposes correctly, hold in your take button half way, tilt back down to your pic, and click it the rest of the way! My only complaint is that it needs a little more contrast and saturation. I just opened the pics with Windows Live Photo Gallery, and hit auto-fix, which fixed most of them great. If not, bump up the saturation or contrast. Easy fix!
customer_reviews.author: PrincessMissfit

customer_reviews.title: Bought 2.  Both failed in short order.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 of these within days of each other. The first one never worked (right out of the box). The second on lasted 5-months before it went haywire. Dealing with Olympus to get them repaired was quite cumbersome. Maybe I just got 2 lemons. But, I would never buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Scatpack392

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Camera....
customer_reviews.text: Good product and high quality. Easy to use , resistant , waterproof. It has several features they've found awesome and helpful. This is my second camera of the Stylus Tough series.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia

customer_reviews.title: Olympus camera has held up despite abuse
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my kid after he destroyed his little Kodak digital (which was a pretyt good little camera). My kid loves this camera. The shcok resistance and water resistance has helped this thing last thorugh a couple years of tough use. And it gives good pictures and serviceable video, too.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Finbar Graham

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera! It works perfect for my needs and pictures turn out great. I also love that it is tough cus i drop it all the time and doesn't even get a scratch!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: this is a video of me testing out the toughness of the camera and the waterproof and as you can see it holds up well and has pretty great quality
customer_reviews.author: thisguy

customer_reviews.title: Broke in one week
customer_reviews.text: It's hard to operate the zoom and the trigger, after one week I got water inside the camera and knew about that because a malfunction in the memory card, It's stopped working.
customer_reviews.author: Uncle Vargas

customer_reviews.title: Camera and price paid are fantabulous!
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera! Pictures taken are fantabulous in or out of water. I did download an example of both type of pictures, in a previous review.
customer_reviews.author: cruiser

customer_reviews.title: Olympus TG-310 Waterproof Camera
customer_reviews.text: Bought this camera for my 17 year old daughter. She loves it. She has taken it to summer camp. It has been in the lake, the pool, and hiking. It is tough. Everyone has passed it around and used it. It works great.
customer_reviews.author: Kimmie

customer_reviews.title: excellent
customer_reviews.text: The shipment arrived quickly, excellent I recommend. Just yesterday the camera use and has many functions. I would try On The Water. THANKS FOR EVERYTHING...
customer_reviews.author: Ana Rosales

customer_reviews.title: Good deal!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera for use outdoors and under rugged conditions. The camera is light weight and takes excellent sharp photos outdoors. The zoom feature leaves a little to be desired. I am having a little bit of a problem taking photos at night where there is a light in the background. The indoor pictures have bit of noise. But overall for the price the camera is a good deal.
customer_reviews.author: T. Harris

customer_reviews.title: really good camera and on time
customer_reviews.text: very good camera for the price, but it did not come with a memory card. Otherwise, price is good for what I got.
customer_reviews.author: Eduardo

customer_reviews.title: the camera us great
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy this camera ever picture quality is great I only wish it had a better zoom. otherwise it is satisfactory.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera after three years of having a cheapy Kodak. I LOVE the fact that it has the waterproof feature and is shockproof. Having a waterproof camera when you live in Hawaii is a must. I took it to the beach and pool the other weekend and got to take pictures of my daughter going down the waterslide. Love the camera, love the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kona Mom

customer_reviews.title: It's great! I take it on "floating down the river" ...
customer_reviews.text: I call it "Gloria- Proof". ... because I can't break it! It's great! I take it on "floating down the river" trips.. (where lots of alcohol is consumed) and I dont worry about if getting wet, or dropped! I take it snowboarding... it's virtually indestructible!! love it!
customer_reviews.author: USMCgilligan

customer_reviews.title: Great Disposable Camera
customer_reviews.text: I received this camera in Mid June. By Mid August, it was done. I enjoyed the use of this camera while snorkeling 2 days a week for 2 months until it no longer worked. I would say a little over $100 is worth the investment for a disposable camera that only lasts 60 days. I sent the camera back to Olympus- they said the camera was unable to be repaired. Olympus offered a link (generous) to some refurbished disposable cameras much like the one that is now inoperable for 2x the $$. I say, fool me once...I had ordered an extra battery, b/c battery life is about 2 hours. Guess I'll be sending that back, too.
customer_reviews.author: stacy l. mixon

customer_reviews.title: camera
customer_reviews.text: this is a very good camera and has a very good price, but only use one time and no more work
customer_reviews.author: buenavista

customer_reviews.title: NOT WORTH IT
customer_reviews.text: I bought the camera to take it on vacation. I received it during the week, let the camera charge and thought i would take it out fishing to try it out before my vacation. Took a few pictures with it. Went swimming I tried to take a few pictures underwater not even a few inches under and well it completely stop working. Not worth it. I am returning it
customer_reviews.author: jackie

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working
customer_reviews.text: I took this on a cruise to the Caribbean and although it took lots of nice pictures, unfortunately when I got home it wouldn't turn on anymore. I followed directions thoroughly and am disappointing that the negative reviews were true. Hopefully I can return.
customer_reviews.author: brewhaha

customer_reviews.title: Dashed lines at bottom of screen
customer_reviews.text: I just bought the camera about a week ago. The screen has a dashed line near the bottom. I cant seem to to get rid of it. It works fine otherwise. The battery life seems quite short. I can only take about 75 pictures before it is out.
customer_reviews.author: paul vo

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Camera!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this camera for a tubing trip on the Niobrara River in north west Nebraska. several other DRUNK! people including myself put this camera to the test. i would gladly buy another.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: disappointed in picture quality
customer_reviews.text: we bought this to replace an earlier model of this camera that got lost. this one, while 'tough' has poor picture quality.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua J. Coon

customer_reviews.title: this company sux
customer_reviews.text: i got the camera and it didnt work, i spent as much money to try and fix it as it cost. not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: jessica friedman

customer_reviews.title: Flop!! it didn't work first time I use it unederneath the water.
customer_reviews.text: Flop!!! It didn't work underneath the water. Instead get busted first time I use it underneath the water, I'm returning it. Very disappointed. I missed all underneath views , corals and all living creatures of the beautiful beaches.
customer_reviews.author: cora

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof???
customer_reviews.text: I took pictures before it got wet and they were decent enough. But after one dip in the water, there was clearly water inside the camera and I eeked out about 8 foggy shots before it shut down completely. What a waste of money. Do NOT take a chance on this one!!! I missed some great shots of a lifetime trusting the Olympus name. It's going back ----I used to LOVE Olympus, but this has put me off.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Kann

customer_reviews.title: Bad Focus
customer_reviews.text: This camera can be good, but the focus doesn't work in closed ambients, I had a bad experience with this camera.
customer_reviews.author: Felipe

product_meta.title: Olympus TG-310 Tough 14.0 MP Digital Camera with 3.6x Wide Optical Zoom and 2.7-Inch LCD, (Blue) (Old Model)
product_meta.description: Color:Blue14 Megapixels, 3.6 x Optical Zoom, 2.7 LCD, Waterproof 3m/10ft, Shockproof 1.5m/ 5ft, Freezeproof -10c/14F

2.7 inch LCD monitor; CCD contrast detection; One touch 720p HD movie with HDMI
Dual image stabilization; 3D Photos (even underwater); TruePic III+ image processing
USB 2.0 High-Speed; SD/SDHC/SDXC compatible (card not included)
